title: TCS Profit Misses Estimates on Slow Tech Spending, Costs
description: Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.’s quarterly earnings missed analysts’ estimates, as corporations continue to limit spending on information technology projects in an era of geopolitical tensions and on one-time costs.

title: China’s Private Equity Trailblazer Fang Fenglei Faces Doubts on Returns, Succession
description: For years, Fang Fenglei was Wall Street’s go-to fixer in China — a partner to heavyweights like Goldman Sachs Group Inc. who built one of Asia’s most prominent private equity firms.

title: NBA Europe Pitches Investors With $1 Billion Price Tags
description: The National Basketball Association is preparing to pitch investors on a new European league, targeting team valuations of up to $1 billion, as it readies a pair of regular season games in London and Berlin.
